    "name": "Number of permutations p of [n] such that max_{j=1..n} |p(j)-j| = floor(n/2).",

        "a(n) = A130152(n,floor(n/2))."
    ],

        "a(4) = 9: 1342, 1423, 1432, 2314, 2413, 3124, 3142, 3214, 3412.",
